channel.title: Compiler Help!
channel.description:
Ok I've tried like thirty different things
Im having like Javac:File not found errors and "You do not have JDK 5.0 or JDK 6.0
I've download and installed JDK 10 and JDK 6.6 and i've tried setting both classpaths and the same error still comes up. I think its a problem with my classpath though. Can someone please help me?

item.title: Compiler Help!
item.dc:creator: @trash101010 trash101010
item.description:
@trash101010 wrote:

it didn’t help at all[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 25, 2008, 07:39:40 pm[/size][hr]anyone help?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 25, 2008, 07:47:40 pm[/size][hr]I need help!!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 25, 2008, 08:49:10 pm[/size][hr]ahhhhhshsdf

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler Help!
item.dc:creator: @trash101010 trash101010
item.description:
@trash101010 wrote:

whats that supposed to do evanz

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler Help!
item.dc:creator: @X_Evanz_X X Evanz X
item.description:
@X_Evanz_X wrote:

[ul][li]Click ‘start’[/li]
[li]Open ‘My computer’[/li]
[li]Right click anywhere and click ‘properties’[/li]
[li]Click the ‘Advanced’ tab[/li]
[li]Click ‘Enviomental variables’[/li]
[li]Under ‘system variables’ click ‘new’[/li]
[li]For the name put ‘Path’[/li]
[li]For the variable put[/ul]

%SystemRoot%\system32;%SystemRoot%;%SystemRoot%\System32\Wbem

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler Help!
item.dc:creator: @trash101010 trash101010
item.description:
@trash101010 wrote:

im still getting the same “Javac:file not found *java” Error

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler Help!
item.dc:creator: @X_Evanz_X X Evanz X
item.description:
@X_Evanz_X wrote:

Right click your compiler.
Click edit.

Replace everything in there with this

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler Help!
item.dc:creator: @trash101010 trash101010
item.description:
@trash101010 wrote:

Ok I’ve tried like thirty different things

Im having like Javac:File not found errors
and "You do not have JDK 5.0 or JDK 6.0

I’ve download and installed JDK 10 and JDK 6.6 and i’ve tried setting both classpaths and the same error still comes up. I think its a problem with my classpath though. Can someone please help me?
